statements: UPDATE company_financial_data SET dividends = 200.85, market_cap = 5000000 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE company_financial_data SET earnings = 1500.75, dividends = 75.25 WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE company_financial_data SET market_cap = 100000000, dividends = 5000000 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE company_financial_data SET earnings = 7500000, dividends = 2000000 WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 10.5, ex_dividend_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
UPDATE earnings SET earnings_amount = 5000.75, earning_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE primary_key = 1;
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 2500 WHERE company_name = 'Example Company' AND ex_dividend_date = '2022-09-15'
UPDATE earnings SET earnings_amount = 15000, earning_date = '2022-10-30' WHERE company_name = 'Another Company'
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 1500.50, record_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE earnings SET report_date = '2022-11-30', earnings_amount = 2500.75 WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 5000.00, record_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE earnings SET earnings_amount = 12000.50, report_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE dividends SET amount = 5000.00, ex_dividend_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE company_id = 123;
UPDATE market_cap SET market_cap = 20000000.00, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE company_id = 456;
UPDATE dividends SET amount = 5000.00, payment_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE company_id = 123;
UPDATE earnings SET amount = 7500.50, quarter = 1, year = 2022 WHERE company_id = 456;
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 10.25, dividend_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE earnings SET earnings_amount = 50000, earnings_date = '2023-02-28' WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE dividends SET dividend_amount = 1000.50, dividend_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE stock_prices SET price = 45.75, price_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE company_id = 3;
